name: Eldarya little tools
description:
Not worth making separate style for each one ^^;
Fast response on forum, Spinning chino head when loading, changing pet gender and name.

style_setting_options.label: make it female
make it male

style_settings.label: If yes, then name it now
hide emoticon box from posting forms

style_setting_options.label: yes
style_setting_options.value:
#forum > div.pun.box.pun_fast_response > form > div.box > fieldset > div > div.smileys, #post > div:nth-child(1) > fieldset > div.smileys {
visibility: hidden !important ;}

style_setting_options.label: kaomoji power ٩( 'ω' )و
normal emojis, not images
